about_the_game:
Survivor: Redemption fuses classic RPG progression with roguelike survivor, drawing inspiration from iconic games like Diablo and Path of Exile. Level up, collect gems to boost your stats, and grow stronger to face escalating challenges. The journey of redemption awaits!

Combat

The combat system is designed around two core elements: your character's auto attacks and skills picked from skill cards, as well as the damage of your pet. The difficulty of this game is no joke—every battle is a true test of your skill and strategy!

Equipment Enhancement System

Our game incorporates traditional RPG progression elements. This is the equipment enhancement system used to upgrade your equipment and boost your character's base stats.

Pet System

In addition to your character's own attacks and skills, pets play the next crucial role. Enhancing your pet uses rune enhancement gems. They have very high attack potential, so make sure to fully utilize them to maximize your damage in battle!

Rune System

The Rune System is an additional attribute enhancement system that complements your equipment upgrades. Runes provide boosts to core stats like attack, defense, and more.

treasure chest

Defeating monsters can drop treasure chests. There are various strengthening stones in the treasure chests. It is a very good way to obtain resources, but it depends on luck, so it is better to get as many treasure chests as possible.

Cards

During each run, you can earn cards by defeating enemies and leveling up. Cards come in three types: Attribute Cards, Skill Cards, and Item Cards. Keep in mind that card effects only apply within the current game session.

Mobs

The game features a variety of small mobs, but especially take note of the large enemies with a red radius indicator. If you find yourself overwhelmed by too many enemies, you can use these explosive monsters to your advantage. They can help clear out large groups of foes by detonating upon getting close to them.

Bosses

Each level features two bosses, one small boss and one big boss. The small boss has attacks that are fairly easy to dodge, but the large boss has a much larger attack range and packs a terrifying punch! Stay on your toes and master the art of dodging, because one wrong move could cost you everything!

Maps

The game features four tiers of difficulty, each with six unique levels, making for a total of 24 exciting maps to explore.

name: survivor redemption

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: intel Core i5- 6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Survivor: Redemption fuses classic RPG progression with roguelike survivor, drawing inspiration from iconic games like Diablo and Path of Exile. Level up, collect gems to boost your stats, and grow stronger to face escalating challenges. The journey of redemption awaits!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese
